parse.title: List of most visited palaces and monuments

text.*:
This is a list of the most visited palaces, historical monuments and memorials in the world. Sources used to compile the list include the Museum Index published by the Themed Entertainment Association (TEA) and the economics practice at AECOM; and the annual survey of the Association of Leading Visitor Attractions (ALVA) in the United Kingdom; the U.S. National Park Service list of National Monuments, and the French and Russian Ministries of Culture

Forbidden City, Beijing, China.
Grand Palace, Bangkok, Thailand
The Taj Mahal, Agra, India
Lincoln Memorial,Washington D.C., U.S.
Palace of Versailles, Versailles, France.
Peterhof Palace, St. Petersburg, Russia

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References

List[edit]

Palaces and monuments by number of visitors per year
Name Country flag, city Visitors per year Year reported
Forbidden City Beijing 16,699,538 2017[1]
Grand Palace Bangkok 8,000,000 2016[2]
Taj Mahal Agra 8,000,000 2017 [3]
Lincoln Memorial Washington, D.C. 7,956,117 2017 [4]
Pantheon Rome 7,398,536 2017
Colosseum Rome 7.036.104 2017
Eiffel Tower Paris 6,910,000 2015[5]
Palace of Versailles Versailles 6,701,193 2016[6]
Peterhof Palace Saint Petersburg 5,245,900 2016[7]
Vietnam Veterans Memorial Washington, D.C. 5,700,000 2017[8]
World War II Memorial Washington, D.C. 5,072,589 2017[9]
Independence National Historical Park Philadelphia 4,790,758 2017[10]
San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park San Francisco 4,493,519 2017[11]
Statue of Liberty National Monument New York City 4,441,988 2017[12]
National Palace Museum[iii] Taipei 4,436,118 2017[13]
Tsarskoe Selo State Museum-Reserve Saint Petersburg 3,694,000 2016[7]
Wilanów Palace Warsaw 3,098,985 2016[6]
Schönbrunn Palace Vienna 3,050,000 2017[14]
Kazan Kremlin Kazan 2,893,300 2016[7]
Tower of London London 2,843,031 2017[15]
Moscow Kremlin Moscow 2,478,622 2016[16]
Battle of Stalingrad State Museum-Reserve Volgograd 2,359,300 2016[7]
Łazienki Palace Warsaw 2,100,000 2016[6]
Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial and Museum Oświęcim 2,053,000 2016[17]
Topkapı Palace Istanbul 2,000,000 2017[18]
Edinburgh Castle Edinburgh 2,063,709 2017[19]
Neuschwanstein Castle Bavaria 1,500,000 2017[20]

See also[edit]

  • List of most visited museums
  • List of most visited art museums
  • List of most visited museums by region

Notes[edit]

^i Includes visitors recorded at all three Metropolitan Museum of Art sites, such as the 505,590 visitors recorded at the Met Breuer.[21]
^ii Statistics refer to the fiscal year ending 30 June 2017.[21]
^iii Includes only the visitors recorded at the main museum in Taipei, and not the 991,666 visitors recorded at the Southern Branch.

  6. ^ a b c "5 most visited Museums: 2016". EGMUS. Retrieved 23 March 2018. 
  7. ^ a b c d "Статистика культуры 2016" (PDF) (in Russian). Ministry of Culture (Russia). p. 40. Retrieved 28 March 2018. 
  8. ^ U.S. National Park Service Statistics (irma.nps.gov)
  9. ^ "Park Statistics". Independence National Historical Park. Retrieved 28 March 2018. 
  10. ^ U.S. National Park Service Statistics (irma.nps.gov)

  15. ^ The Art Newspaper, 26 March, 2018
